name: salesforce-org-quick-pick
description: Quickly switch between Salesforce orgs from the status bar without breaking your flow.
author: trevSmart

filterPattern.description: Glob pattern to filter which Salesforce org aliases to show. Examples: 'DEV*', 'PROD', '*TEST*'

quickAccessOrder.description: Order for quick access buttons in status bar (lower numbers appear first)

quickAccessLabel.description: Custom label to show on quick access button. If empty, uses the org alias

salesforceOrgQuickPick.orgFilters.description: Array of filter configurations for Salesforce org aliases. Each filter can specify a pattern, order for quick access, and custom label

salesforceOrgQuickPick.browser.description: Browser to use when opening Salesforce orgs

salesforceOrgQuickPick.showTooltip.description: Show interactive tooltip with clickable org aliases on status bar hover

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.bump-version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); const [major, minor, patch] = pkg.version.split('.').map(Number); pkg.version = major + '.' + minor + '.' + (patch + 1); fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)); console.log('Version bumped to', pkg.version);"
scripts.package: npm run bump-version && mkdir -p dist && npx vsce package --out dist
scripts.install-extension: npm run bump-version && npm run compile && npm run clean && npm run package && cursor --install-extension dist/salesforce-org-quick-pick-*.vsix --force
